data.title: 以 1 到 3 分钟谈论以下主题
data.content: Do you think that it is important for people to dress well? Provide reasons to support your opinion.
data.answer: I think it is very important for people to dress well. Dressing well means dressing property in matching environments. For example, wearing school uniforms when going to school; wearing business casual when attending a job interview, and wearing formal dresses and suits when attending a ball. Dressing properly would give others the very first impression that you are a decent person. It also conveys the information of you are showing respect to your education, work, or other occasions to others.
